availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry L. Parry (Mason County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Parry. Father of Mary E. "Mollie" Parry. Married to Margaret A. Parry. Father of Lizzie Parry and Susan Parry. Physician in Mason County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Mason County in 1850. Physician in Mason County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, District 3, p. 147B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, District 3, p. 775.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, District 2, p. 57.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, District 2, p. 9B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Mays Lick, p. 374A.
